item.title: Exclusive: Pace raises $10 million from Sequoia as enterprise AI collides with insurance
item.description: Pace is betting insurance is ripe for AI disruption.

item.title: TikTok users panic over the app’s ‘immigration data’ collection in its new privacy policy, but the wording isn’t new—here’s what it means
item.description: Experts say the phrasing has appeared in previous privacy policies and reflects legal requirements.

item.title: The British retailer riding the wave of America’s always-booming sneaker market
item.description: With Foot Locker struggling, JD Sports sees a chance to grab market share.
